https://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/6.4/amd64/BOOTX64.EFI

After each upgrade (and before entering the new OpenBSD system), there are two ways to update the `BOOTX64.EFI` file:

* Download `https://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/${openbsd_version}/amd64/BOOTX64.EFI`
* Move `BOOTX64.EFI` from `$esp/EFI/Boot/bootx64.efi` (which is generated by each upgrade)
